class_notes:
(Same as DANC 385-1)


This course will introduce students to the collaborative possibilities between music/sound creators and dance creators. Students will be exposed to diverse creative methods and approaches, experimenting with the interplay between sound and movement, offering opportunities to enhance communication skills and further develop and elucidate their artistic voice. This course will be open to music and dance students.
course_description: Selected topics in Music. May be repeated when topic varies.
schedule_location: F 2:30pm-5:15pm in BRB Performing Arts Studio
